main: ^Bob: Well Kelly, I sure am thirsty. What drinks do you have here, aynthing good?
^How about a beer and lets get shitfaced?
^Errr I have some coffee if you fancy it.
BeerOption: ^Bob: Hell yeah that sounds good. Go get me a beer while I stand here and wait
Coffee: ^Fuck that shit. LETS PARTY. SPRING BREAK BITCHES.
^Go get me a beer and lets do this shit!
GotItem: ^What are you waiting for, pass me the water!
